general.gigTitle: design and develop your wordpress cms and blog website for business

sellerCard.oneLiner: Seasoned Web Developer with Ninja Development Skills
sellerCard.description: I have many years of experience in designing & development. i have delivered over 499+ website projects successfully. I have excellent skills in Designing, Joomla ,open cart wordpress Open source front end development I am  sensual,Patient, organized and supportive I can follow instructions very well and will deliver the project on time.I can try my level best doing my tasks.

description.content:
Hi Everyone:

My Self is Shamas Sabahet, A WordPress Developer, and I have 12 years of design and development experience. I can design and develop your project which is based on WordPress CMS and make it professionally.

I can design, update, and redesign your website which look more elegant. 

I can make your website bug-free and improve its performance.

I also migrate your website into WordPress. 

I can do the following things in WordPress:

  • Blog Website 
  • Customized Web Design 
  • Single page website
  • Portfolio
  • HTML/CSS Based WordPress Designing 
  • Bug Fixing and Performance Improvement
  • Optimization of Site
  • Migration of sites 
  • Landing Pages


I also solve your sight technical problems. 

I offer my WordPress Development Services at affordable costs and also provide extraordinary customer services. You can order with full satisfaction. 


Feel free to contact me, Cheers!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why I need to discuss before place order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Some clients don't know how this works. You need to make sure your hosting, domain, content is ready. This is important to discuss before order so that I get all information. If you don't provide materials, information which need and you ask to cancel, I will not be able to cancel the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You would need a domain and hosting account. If you don't have any then don't worry I'll assist you. I'll also need your company logo(optional) & a total number of pages for the website. e.g. Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us, Blog. I'll further need content (text, images) for these pages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain or hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't provide domain and hosting But, I will send you the best domain and hosting details for you. you will get the best deal for your website.just send me a message for the deal.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you upload website on our hosting to make it live?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do this without any extra charges. I will need username and password of your hosting or Cpanel detail.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide multiple revisions. Your 100% satisfaction is my first priority.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Would I be able to easily manage my website from admin panel? I don't have any knowledge of programming.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will be able to easily add /update/delete/ maintain a website from admin panel without any programming skills. I will provide the username and password of the admin panel.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be Mobile Friendly?
Will My website be SEO Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, The basic structure of your website will be SEO Friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see some samples of your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can drop me a message to see samples of my work. I'll respond to you in a short time.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide license key for theme and plugins?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. I build a website using a premium theme and without a license, you can use it without any problem. A license key only needed for the auto update. If you want a license key, you need to purchase a theme license from vendors

packageList.title: Basic WordPress Website
packageList.description: WordPress and Theme installation + Landing page + Contact form+Blog (all with full customization)

packageList.title: Standard Website Design
packageList.description: Outstanding website 5-10 informational pages, Social Media integration, Map, Secure panel.

packageList.title: Ecommerce Mobile Friendly Website
packageList.description: Up to 20 pages + State of the Art Design + E-Commerce with shopping cart (WooCommerce), Secure

reviews.comment: Shamas is truly amazing! He not only rescued my broken website but went above and beyond to tackle other issues I hadn't even noticed! I'm beyond thrilled with his work and can't recommend him enough!

Shamas M is a top-tier choice in website development. His work was impeccable, showcasing professionalism and a keen eye for detailtruly bug-free and polished. Plus, collaborating with him was a delight as he went above and beyond at every step.

A little late and communication was a bit difficult but the service was very good
my website looks like what I wanted
Absolutely amazing to work with. Extremely patient as I am a picky person and never got frustrated or annoyed. I will always come back for any of my needs!
Shamas exceeded every expectation and delivered a top-notch website with professionalism. Working with him was a breeze as he consistently went above and beyond. Highly recommend
